lead_paragraph: PARIS - When police in Thailand this week discovered large stockpiles of chemicals often used to make bombs, they quickly said the material was going to be shipped out of Thailand to another (unnamed) country. The chemicals -fertilizer ingredients in bags labelled as kitty litter - were going to be packed into boxes labeled electric fans and exported.
snippet: PARIS - An intelligence analyst in the United States says Hezbollah is almost certainly implicated in the seizure of bomb-making chemicals in Thailand this week. But contrary to statements by Thai officials, terrorists probably planned to use the ...

headline.main: Tracking the Hezbollah Connection in Thailand

abstract: PARIS - An intelligence analyst in the United States says Hezbollah is almost certainly implicated in the seizure of bomb-making chemicals in Thailand this week. But contrary to statements by Thai officials, terrorists probably planned to use the ingredients inside the country.
